details: Developing education research informed resources for high school physics.
Designing interactive simulations to visualize abstract physics concepts.

Analysing and comparing Waterfall and Agile methodologies.

Debugged programs written in Python by fixing syntax and logic errors in the code & deep analysis of SDLC & STLC.

Designed and simple and scalable hosting architecture based on Elastic Beanstalk for a client experiencing significant growth and slow response times & described my proposed architecture in plain language ensuring my client understood how it works and how costs will be calculated for it.
